definition[0]: used to suggest that someone should do something, because there is no good reason to do anything else
example[0]: I suppose we might as well go home.
definition[1]: used to say that the effect of an action or situation is the same as if it was another one
example[1]: They might as well have a badge on them saying ‘Steal me’.
example[2]: He might as well have been a million miles away.
